overview:
Enabling businesses to connect with their customers.

Anindya turned entrepreneur after spending a couple of decades in Sales and Marketing of high technology products and services to leading companies in India and South Asia, Taiwan and Korea. Ran large international sales and marketing teams and managed budgets and targets. Created game changing processes and internet enabled IT tools for customer facing activities. Anindya is proficient in creating large interdisciplinary processes and leading distributed teams. Anindya runs Anwesha CRM Pvt Ltd; which is building a slew of tools delivered over the internet to enable small businesses to profitably manage their sales and marketing activities. Anindya holds a B.Tech in Electronics Engineering from IT BHU, Varanasi and Post Graduate Diploma in Management (MBA) from IIM Calcutta, INDIA.
